page.title: 17Childrens Games In Middleton
page.content:
Hide and seek. Blind Mans Buff Marbles Two Ball Game
Hide And Seek:This is a game that a lot of people can play.One person counts to 100 and then comes to find the other people.When all are caught the game starts again. Blind Mans Buff:This is a game that a lot of people can play.One person puts a blind fold over his/her eyes and tries to find the rest of the people and guess their names. Marbles:This is a game where you try to get your opponents round marbles by hitting them with your marble.The person with no marbles left wins the game.Boys usually play this game! Two Ball Game:Only two people can play this game.You play on a wall and throw two balls against the wall.If you drop a ball you are out.
